assetProfile.address2: 19th Floor Jaber Al Mubarak street Sharq
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: National Investments Company K.S.C.P., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the investment, treasury, real estate, and asset management, advisory, and brokerage businesses in Kuwait and internationally. The company's Investment segment trades in equities, including investment in associates and other strategic investments. Its Treasury segment is involved in liquidity management and trading foreign currencies. The company's Real Estate segment engages in buying, selling, and investing in real estate. Its Asset Management, Advisory, and Brokerage segment is involved in the management of discretionary and non-discretionary investment portfolios, and investment funds, as well as the provision of brokerage, advisory, and other related financial services. The company is also involved in the real estate development, management, and advisory services for institutional clients in commercial, residential, industrial, and tourism sectors. In addition, it offers debt structuring, divestitures, financial restructuring, and mergers and acquisitions advisory services; capital raising through public offerings and private placements; and information technology, and trading and contracting activities. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Kuwait City, Kuwait.
